name: Gladstone Backpackers
description:
Experience the real Australia at Gladstone backpackers! Located off the beaten path midway between Rainbow Beach and Airlie Beach, Gladstone offers the unique blend of country, coast, entertainment, and shopping. We are the perfect place to take a travel break or go adventuring like a true local to one of the many hidden beaches off the Southern Great Barrier Reef. Relax by the pool or play a game of darts or Jenga. Check out our activities board packed with weekly in-house events such as pool parties, bar games, movie nights, beach days and maybe more! This is where you can become part of the Gladstone family! There is never a dull moment here thanks to the hostelsâ€™ Adventure Shuttle service that offers mountain climbing, kayaking, and fishing tours all at backpacker friendly prices. 

Enjoy our homely facilities such as a fully stocked kitchen and rooms with individual fans. The common area features a pool table, plasma screen TV you can watch while hanging out with our friendly Dog, Charlie (he runs the show), our assistant dog Arlo, the pet turtle Raph or Godzilla - the Bearded Dragon. For those of you who are brave, you can get a cuddle from our pet snake Bradley!

Charlies Bar is the main meeting place, and where all the action happens. From coffees at breakfast, local craft beer on taps to Espresso Martinis as the sun sets. Meet your fellow guests and book your next adventure!

We offer FREE: Wi-Fi, breakfast, linen and towels, and endless love from our onsite dog Charlie and Arlo.

groupInformation.terms: All group bookings must have 50% deposit 4 weeks prior to booking and full payment by 2 weeks prior to booking date.
groupInformation.cancellationTerms:
50% deposit to be paid 4 weeks prior to group booking. Any changes made  less than 4 weeks from booking will incur a non-rechargeable 50% deposit. 
No refunds of remainder of fees for cancellations will be made within 48 hours of booking date.
groupInformation.additionalTerms:
Valid Passports Required to check in. 
Key Deposit fee charged per room/ key provided.

houseRules.notes:
Reception Open for Check In 8am - 8pm, for late check in give us a call before 8 pm and pay in advance
Long-term and groups on request
Min age 18yo
Please ring if you want to book a transfer
Parties occasionally happen, join in?
Wifi restrictions apply
Passport or Government Issued Photo ID required for Check In
